prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a yellow body and brown feet that can put others to sleep.
I want a Pokemon that looks like a sleepy creature, with a round shape and a unique nose.
Generate a Pokemon character that has a striking yellow color, resembling a creature from dreams.
Make a bipedal Pokemon that has a cuddly appearance and is known for its hypnotic abilities.
Imagine a Pokemon with a soft, rounded body that can be found in urban areas, often dreaming.
Design a Pokemon with large ears and a sleepy expression that thrives in forest habitats.
Give me a unique Pokemon that has distinctive brown hands and a knack for inducing sleep.
